tool_description: Manages save-for-later functionality by moving items between active cart and saved items list with quantity preservation and restoration capabilities.

cart_id.description: Unique identifier for the shopping cart

item_ids.description: Array of item IDs to move to/from saved list

operation.description: Operation type: save_items, restore_items, or list_saved

preserve_quantity.description: Whether to preserve original quantities when moving items

customer_id.description: Customer ID for saved items association

error_messages: Invalid cart ID: Provide a valid, existing cart identifier.
Invalid operation: Use one of: save_items, restore_items, list_saved.
Invalid item IDs: Ensure all item IDs exist and are valid.
Customer ID required: Valid customer ID is required for save-for-later operations.
Operation limit: Maximum 10 items can be processed per operation.
Save operation failed: Unable to complete save-for-later operation due to system error.
usage: Provide cart_id, item_ids array, operation type, and customer_id. Use 'save_items' to move from cart to saved, 'restore_items' to move back to cart, or 'list_saved' to view saved items.

operation_success.description: Whether the save-for-later operation completed successfully

processed_items.description: Array of item IDs that were successfully processed

saved_items_count.description: Total number of items currently in saved list

cart_items_count.description: Total number of items remaining in active cart
